Looking for more than just deal registration? Vartopia has partnered with Gorilla Toolz to create Supernova. A complete PRM platform that is fully integrated with Salesforce CRM.

Partner Registration Portal

Your Salesforce CRM

Supernova provides the tools necessary to manage all aspects of your indirect sales channel.

Features Include:

  • Multi-Tier Program Support
  • Automated Partner Onboarding
  • Partner Self Service
  • Program Management
  • Collateral and Document Management
  • MDF Management
  • Event Management
  • Portal Messaging
  • Lead Management
  • Deal Registration

Supernova can be fully integrated into your Salesforce CRM allowing you to manage partner participation and partner performance directly in Salesforce.

The Vartopia Salesforce CRM module provides the following capabilities.

  • Partner and Partner User Data Synchronization
  • Lead Distribution from Salesforce
  • Deal Registration Management
